name: vega-force
description: Force simulation transform for Vega dataflows.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-force.js -c -m -o build/vega-force.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-force:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-force.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-force.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-force.js build/vega-force.min.js
